item.description:
Megamind Movie Madness

What?
We're waching Megamind in 3D @ the Waterford Regal Cinema

When?
Let's Meet at 1:15pm > Movie Starts at 1:30pm

Where?
Regal Cinema in Waterford 123 Cross Rd. Waterford, CT 06385

Extra Notes:
I strongly urge everyone to buy their tickets online first so we can just meet up outside 15-30 minutes before the movie starts and go in & get seats as a group.

**This is a PG film, so feel free to bring your age appropriate children and make it a family outing.

group.name: Atheist Humanist Society of CT and RI

item.name: Megamind Movie Madness
